evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiff Hampton Y. Dellinger is the Special Counsel of the United States Office of Special Counsel.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Hampton Y. Dellinger, Special Counsel of the United States Office of Special Counsel

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Scott Bessent is the Secretary of the Treasury. He is sued in his official capacity.

extracted.value: Defendant: Scott Bessent, Secretary of the Treasury

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Sergio Gor is the Director of the White House Presidential Personnel Office. He is sued in his official capacity.

extracted.value: Defendant: Sergio Gor, Director of the White House Presidential Personnel Office

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Karen Gorman is the Principal Deputy Special Counsel and, upon the removal of the Special Counsel, the Acting Special Counsel of the Office of Special Counsel.

extracted.value: Defendant: Karen Gorman, Principal Deputy Special Counsel and Acting Special Counsel of the Office of Special Counsel

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Karl Kammann is the Chief Operating Officer of the Office of Special Counsel.

extracted.value: Defendant: Karl Kammann, Chief Operating Officer of the Office of Special Counsel

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Donald J. Trump is the President of the United States and is responsible for the decision to remove Mr. Dellinger from his office. He is sued in his official capacity.

extracted.value: Defendant: Donald J. Trump, President of the United States

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendant Russell Vought is the Director of the Office of Management and Budget as of his confirmation by the Senate on February 7, 2025. He is sued in his official capacity.

extracted.value: Defendant: Russell Vought, Director of the Office of Management and Budget
